content: s t or m y w at er s | 1  stormy waters by elena nodel stormy moody ever changing direction …like stormy waters… this hat will keep you engaged from start to finish knitting up into its own story this design is perfect for semi-solid and variegated colorways for that special one skein the style is unisex thus making the design perfect for everyone in your family where will stormy waters take you ©elena nodel 2015 s t or m y w at er s | 2 yardage and sizes info abbreviations you will need 1 skein of worsted yarn that has ~ 150 pm = place marker yds/137 m slipm = move marker from the left needle to the hat will fit head with circumference of 21-23 /53 5- right needle 58 5 cm st s = stitch es round s = round s copyright k = knit p = purl please respect my designer rights and as such the kfb = knit into the front of the stitch then knit copyright of this pattern will always remain with me i into the back of the same stitch 1 st increased am providing this pattern for personal home use only ktbl = knit through the back loop of the stitch you may make garments from it as gifts or donate to skp = slip one st as if to knit knit next st pass charities and fundraisers commercial use of this pattern the slipped st over the knitted one 1 st decreased is a violation of the copyright selling products made k2tog = knit two stitches together as one 1 st from this pattern or distributing this pattern in any manner is prohibited under the copyright unless i elena decreased nodel have granted express written permission p2tog = purl two stitches together as one 1 st decreased acknowledgements gauge  heartfelt thanks and my deepest gratitude go to my wonderful group of testers allison audur bec janet 19 sts and 24 row in stockinette per 10x10 cm/4x4 lynley katya laura monique and ronny whose hard inches on us #7/4 5 mm needles or size needed to work and most valuable input made this pattern obtain gauge possible special thanks go to jane for helping me with the notions presentation and editing of this pattern  us #5/3 5 mm and us #7/4 5 mm circular needles 16 /40 cm and dpns or size needed to obtain contact information gauge email
